name: Arctic Monkeys - AM
description: AM is the fifth studio album by English rock band Arctic Monkeys.

name: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Californication
description: Californication is the seventh studio album by U.S. rock band Red Hot Chili Peppers, released on June 8, 1999, on Warner Bros. Records.

name: Nirvana - Nevermind
description: Nevermind is the second studio album by the American rock band Nirvana, released on September 24, 1991, by DGC Records.

name: The Weeknd - The Highlights
description: The Highlights is the second greatest hits album, and first one released globally, by Canadian singer-songwriter the Weeknd.
